Label: Interball-Tail 6 sec vector magnetic field data - M.Nozdrachev (IKI, Moscow, Russia)

VariableDescription.Name: BF1
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******
#              ************************************
#
#     PROJECT                         ISTP>International Solar-Terrestrial Physics
#     SOURCE_NAME                     INTERBALL-TAIL>Interball Tail Probe
#     DISCIPLINE                      Space Physics>Magnetospheric Science
#     DATA_TYPE                       H0>6 sec vector data
#     DESCRIPTOR                      MFI> Magnetic Field Data
#     DATA_VERSION                    1
#     PI_NAME                         M.Nozdrachev
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  IKI, Moscow, Russia
#     TEXT                            Magnetic field measurements on the  Interball- Tail  satellites are carried                            
#                                      out by IZMIRAN and Space Research Institute RAS  (SRI)                                                
#                                     since 1995.  Satellite has  the orbits  with  apogee 200000 (30 Re)  and perigee                       
#                                      500 km. and provides measurements in the solar wind and in the different                              
#                                     regions of the magnetosphere at the same time with Geotail, Polar and Interbal-A                       
#                                      working in the magnetosphere and  Wind, ACE in the solar wind.                                        
#                                     Magnetic field measurements on-board the Interball  Tail Probe are carried out                         
#                                      by the FM-3I and MFI instruments. FM-3I consists of two flux-gate                                     
#                                     magnetometers M1 and  M2  covering two  different  ranges:  200  nT  and  1000                         
#                                       nT.  The   M2 instrument is mostly  used to perform the  attitude                                    
#                                     control of  the INTERBALL TAIL spacecraft.   M1 magnetometer data are transmitted                      
#                                      to the scientific SSNI  telemetry  system at rates  0.125-16 vectors/s                                
#                                     depending on the instrument  operating mode. The magnetic field data from the                          
#                                      M2 magnetometer are transmitted at the  rate 1 vectors per 6 sec. to  the                             
#                                     BNS attitude  control  system.  MFI magnetometer has the next parameters: measured                     
#                                      range 0.3-37.5 nT, frequency range 0-2  Hz, sampling rate  from 1/4                                   
#                                     to 8 measurements per second. FM-3 M2 magnetometer failed in February 1996,                            
#                                      FM-3 M1 and MFI are working until now.                                                                
#                                     Data presented here are the  combination of the data of all magnetometers. First                       
#                                      of all   FM-3 M1 data are used,  if they are absent, used MFI data                                    
#                                     and if data of both magnetometer are absent, FM-3 M2 data presented. In case                           
#                                      of FM-3 M1 and MFI, data are averaged for 6 seconds intervals.                                        
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Magnetic Fields (space)
#     MISSION_GROUP                   Interball
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  it_h0_mfi
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 it_h0_mfi_00000000_v01
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      Interball-Tail 6 sec vector magnetic field data
#     TIME_RESOLUTION                 6 sec
#     MODS                            created CDF August 2000 by Mona Kessel, data provided by
#                                     Dr. Valery G. Petrov ZMIRAN,
#                                     Troitsk, Moscow region,
#                                     142092, Russia
#                                     http://antares.izmiran.rssi.ru/projects/PROGNOZ-MF/
#     ADID_REF                        NSSD0110
#     ALT_LOGICAL_SOURCE              interball-Tail_MFI-H0_6sec_cdf
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. Default time
#  2. Magnetic Field Magnitude, 6 sec, scalar
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Thu Jan 15 22:59:42 2015
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#  2. Magnetic Field Magnitude, 6 sec, scalar
#
EPOCH                             |B|
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms             nT
06-08-1995 07:11:09.000       5.40000

#     TEXT                            Magnetic field measurements on the  Interball- Tail  satellites are carried                            
#                                      out by IZMIRAN and Space Research Institute RAS  (SRI)                                                
#                                     since 1995.  Satellite has  the orbits  with  apogee 200000 (30 Re)  and perigee                       
#                                      500 km. and provides measurements in the solar wind and in the different                              
#                                     regions of the magnetosphere at the same time with Geotail, Polar and Interbal-A

#                                     magnetometers M1 and  M2  covering two  different  ranges:  200  nT  and  1000                         
#                                       nT.  The   M2 instrument is mostly  used to perform the  attitude                                    
#                                     control of  the INTERBALL TAIL spacecraft.   M1 magnetometer data are transmitted                      
#                                      to the scientific SSNI  telemetry  system at rates  0.125-16 vectors/s                                
#                                     depending on the instrument  operating mode. The magnetic field data from the                          
#                                      M2 magnetometer are transmitted at the  rate 1 vectors per 6 sec. to  the                             
#                                     BNS attitude  control  system.  MFI magnetometer has the next parameters: measured                     
#                                      range 0.3-37.5 nT, frequency range 0-2  Hz, sampling rate  from 1/4                                   
#                                     to 8 measurements per second. FM-3 M2 magnetometer failed in February 1996,                            
#                                      FM-3 M1 and MFI are working until now.                                                                
#                                     Data presented here are the  combination of the data of all magnetometers. First                       
#                                      of all   FM-3 M1 data are used,  if they are absent, used MFI data

#                                      of FM-3 M1 and MFI, data are averaged for 6 seconds intervals.                                        
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Magnetic Fields (space)
#     MISSION_GROUP                   Interball
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  it_h0_mfi
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 it_h0_mfi_00000000_v01
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      Interball-Tail 6 sec vector magnetic field data
#     TIME_RESOLUTION                 6 sec
#     MODS                            created CDF August 2000 by Mona Kessel, data provided by
#                                     Dr. Valery G. Petrov ZMIRAN,
#                                     Troitsk, Moscow region,
#                                     142092, Russia
#                                     http://antares.izmiran.rssi.ru/projects/PROGNOZ-MF/
#     ADID_REF                        NSSD0110
#     ALT_LOGICAL_SOURCE              interball-Tail_MFI-H0_6sec_cdf
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. Default time
#  2. Magnetic Field, 6 sec, cartesian GSE
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Thu Jan 15 22:59:43 2015
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#  2. Magnetic Field, 6 sec, cartesian GSE
#
EPOCH                                   BX_GSE                 BY_GSE                 BZ_GSE
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms                      nT                     nT                     nT
06-08-1995 07:11:09.000               -3.50000               -3.50000               -2.10000
